backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, staff records, attendance data, and salary-related storage with access control enforcement.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state and initializing empty maps for user, staff, attendance, and salary data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence annotations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text bundle summarizing multiple frontend files, including layout sections, hooks, utilities, and styling descriptions.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment runbook describing steps, checks, and procedures for deploying the Salary Split Calculator app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme tokens and enforcing pure white backgrounds in light mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including metadata and script loader for the Salary Split Calculator SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, profile setup, salary calculators, and layout components with React Query.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity hooks and handles authentication states and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal for users to enter and save profile details with validation and React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/salary/FinalSala: Implements an attendance-based salary calculation workflow with staff selection, finalization, and WhatsApp/SMS message generation.
frontend/src/components/salary/SalarySpl: Provides a salary split calculator with zone selection, manual mode, and Tamil Nadu Hotel Rule configuration.
frontend/src/components/salary/TamilNadu: Renders configuration controls for Tamil Nadu Hotel Rule, including designation-based basic percentage and gross salary inputs.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Shows an About section highlighting features and commitments of Radha general industries.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details, business hours, and a call-to-action section for inquiries and orders.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section component with scroll-to-contact behavior, call button, and location info.
frontend/src/components/sections/Machine: Displays a grid of machinery items with images, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Shows workflow steps, capabilities list, and includes the machinery block.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Renders product cards with descriptions and applications plus a contact CTA.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing copyright and caffeine.ai attribution with theme styling.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Fixed header showing app title, subtitle, and login button when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/staff/StaffMaste: Form and table UI for adding and managing staff with salary components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s user profile using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFinalSalary.ts: Manages salary form state and computes final salary values with validations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalarySplit.ts: Manages salary-split state per zone with auto-calculation logic for basic pay, supporting manual and Tamil Nadu hotel rule modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffMaster.ts: React Query hooks for fetching staff, adding staff, saving attendance-month data, and finalizing salary via actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and typography for the application.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports display and dialable versions of the application's contact phone number.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting numbers and currency using Indian locale conventions.
frontend/src/lib/finalSalaryMessage.ts: Generates final salary statements and creates WhatsApp and SMS message links for employees.
frontend/src/lib/hotelDesignations.ts: Provides a comprehensive list of hotel industry job designations and its associated type.
frontend/src/lib/zoneDesignationBasicCon: Defines basic salary config types and zone‑wise designation mappings with defaults for manual and TN rule percentages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for the salary calculator app.
